channel.title: CirnoPK - StorkPK Replica w/additions and More!
channel.description:
This is RSC with a twist. it is point based with an economy and will be worked on where Runescape left off PK wise!
[b]Start playing by:[/b]
-Go to [url=http://cirnopk.com]CirnoPK[/url] and [url=http://cirnopk.com/register.php]Register[/url] -Click on [url=http://cirnopk.com/accountmanager.php]control panel[/url], then [url=http://cirnopk.com/registerchar.php]Create CirnoPK Account[/url] -Click on the account you registered and set your starting points to the stats you prefer -Finally Click on client to download it and log-in using the character account you just created OR use our [url=http://cirnopk.com/webclient.php]Webclient[/url]
Be sure to log-out every once in awhile to goto the control panel to put the points you accumulated into your stats
[b]Some current features:[/b]
-Kill Saradomin! Event [img]http://i.imgur.com/NC5iLTq.jpg[/img] [img]http://cirnopk.com/event_arena.png[/img] -Xp rates are 6x for non subscribers 8x for subs outside wilderness, 14x and 16x inside wild -98.8% uptime -Clan system with clan wars and territory--Subscriber xp at the territory for winning it. -Dm Arena -Staking -Max Stat 125 -Pk only stats -Web client -Customize your looks
[b]Control Panel[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6EQnEmf.jpg[/img]
[b]Customize your players looks anyway you want[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DeRheFW.jpg[/img]
[b]Starting out Bank[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OBOjjwy.jpg[/img]
[b]Custom training areas[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jKx7bY8.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/50Z0pJZ.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/45HGw6n.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Do7f6Y2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5DxMv4Q.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/a0fSxog.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/EeN0nXb.jpg[/img] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vJNJKTz16hs[/youtube] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4OOad1Rztls[/youtube] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6g0t1g4rLBU[/youtube] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PgoqoISMjUI[/youtube]
create a new version of this paste RAW Paste Data This is a Pk server with a twist. it is point based with an economy and will be worked on where Runescape left off PK wise! [b]Start playing by:[/b] -Go to [url=http://cirnopk.com]CirnoPK[/url] and [url=http://cirnopk.com/register.php]Register[/url] -Click on [url=http://cirnopk.com/accountmanager.php]control panel[/url], then [url=http://cirnopk.com/registerchar.php]Create CirnoPK Account[/url] -Click on the account you registered and set your starting points to the stats you prefer -Finally Click on client to download it and log-in using the character account you just created OR use our [url=http://cirnopk.com/webclient.php]Webclient[/url] Be sure to log-out every once in awhile to goto the control panel to put the points you accumulated into your stats [b]Some current features:[/b] -Kill Saradomin! Event [img]http://i.imgur.com/NC5iLTq.jpg[/img] [img]http://cirnopk.com/event_arena.png[/img] -Xp rates are 6x for non subscribers 8x for subs outside wilderness, 14x and 16x inside wild -98.8% uptime -Clan system with clan wars and territory--Subscriber xp at the territory for winning it. -Dm Arena -Staking -Max Stat 125 -Pk only stats -Web client -Customize your looks [b]Control Panel[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6EQnEmf.jpg[/img] [b]Customize your players looks anyway you want[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DeRheFW.jpg[/img] [b]Starting out Bank[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OBOjjwy.jpg[/img] [b]Custom training areas[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jKx7bY8.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/50Z0pJZ.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/45HGw6n.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Do7f6Y2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5DxMv4Q.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/a0fSxog.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/EeN0nXb.jpg[/img] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vJNJKTz16hs[/youtube] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4OOad1Rztls[/youtube] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6g0t1g4rLBU[/youtube] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PgoqoISMjUI[/youtube]

item.title: CirnoPK - StorkPK Replica w/additions and More!
item.dc:creator: @CirnoPK_Support CirnoPK Support
item.description:
@CirnoPK_Support wrote:

This is RSC with a twist. it is point based with an economy and will be worked on where Runescape left off PK wise!
 
[b]Start playing by:[/b]
 
-Go to [url=http://cirnopk.com]CirnoPK[/url] and [url=http://cirnopk.com/register.php]Register[/url]
-Click on [url=http://cirnopk.com/accountmanager.php]control panel[/url], then [url=http://cirnopk.com/registerchar.php]Create CirnoPK Account[/url]
-Click on the account you registered and set your starting points to the stats you prefer
-Finally Click on client to download it and log-in using the character account you just created OR use our [url=http://cirnopk.com/webclient.php]Webclient[/url]
 
Be sure to log-out every once in awhile to goto the control panel to put the points you accumulated into your stats
 
[b]Some current features:[/b]
 
-Kill Saradomin! Event
[img]http://i.imgur.com/NC5iLTq.jpg[/img]
[img]http://cirnopk.com/event_arena.png[/img]
-Xp rates are 6x for non subscribers 8x for subs outside wilderness, 14x and 16x inside wild
-98.8% uptime
-Clan system with clan wars and territory--Subscriber xp at the territory for winning it.
-Dm Arena
-Staking
-Max Stat 125
-Pk only stats
-Web client
-Customize your looks
 
 
 
[b]Control Panel[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6EQnEmf.jpg[/img]
 
[b]Customize your players looks anyway you want[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/DeRheFW.jpg[/img]
 
[b]Starting out Bank[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/OBOjjwy.jpg[/img]
 
[b]Custom training areas[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/jKx7bY8.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/50Z0pJZ.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Do7f6Y2.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5DxMv4Q.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/a0fSxog.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/EeN0nXb.jpg[/img]
